data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Song, Zhenzhen, Ren, Li, Zhang, Runzhi, Zhou, Chenggang (2017): Review of the species of Leptomias Faust from Sichuan, China (Coleoptera, Curculionidae, Entiminae). ZooKeys 678: 97-119, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.678.12543, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.678.12543
